LANDING_PAGE.MAIN_SUBTITLE_2_POINT_1: Revolutionary Innovations in Accounting and Auditing
LANDING_PAGE.MAIN_SUBTITLE_2_POINT_2: Enhancing Business Strategy with Artificial Intelligence
LANDING_PAGE.MAIN_SUBTITLE_2_POINT_3: Capturing Key Data for Growth Potential through Continuous Auditing
LANDING_PAGE.MAIN_SUBTITLE_2_POINT_4: Easing Daily Work Burdens on Audit Teams
LANDING_PAGE.MAIN_SUBTITLE_2_POINT_5: Empowering Financial Teams to Focus on Corporate Development Planning
LANDING_PAGE.PRIVACY_BLOCK_CONTENT_1: iSunFA integrates various systems within your enterprise, such as Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems, FinTech back-office systems, and software development version control systems. It automates the analysis of your enterprise's activities, generates the vouchers and certificates for accounting purposes, and converts them into de-identified zero-knowledge proof evidence (zk-proof evidence). AI facilitates continuous auditing through this data processing. Consequently, technology companies gain real-time access to the R&D costs and revenue statuses of different projects within the enterprise, while FinTech companies promptly assess their daily operational exposure levels.
LANDING_PAGE.PRIVACY_BLOCK_CONTENT_2: Through unified format zero-knowledge proof evidence, financial units can obtain the most recent and precise comparison of financial data within 24 hours. Meanwhile, they they can verify the professional background of the accountants and the trustworthiness of the data sources. This results in saving a significant amount of time and costs in regulatory and tax work, such as data comparison and inspection, allowing attention to be focused on activities that enhance enterprise value.
LANDING_PAGE.PRIVACY_BLOCK_CONTENT_3: Through big data analysis and AI, we offer financial analysis reports and suggestions. iSunFA serves as a professional accounting consultant with 30 years of experience and expertise in global accounting standards. We ensure that businesses, while complying with legal and regulatory requirements, fully articulate their potential value through financial data and reports, assisting investors and management in making informed decisions.
LANDING_PAGE.NUMBER_BLOCK_DESCRIPTION_1: Boost auditing and accounting report compilation time by 150 times.
LANDING_PAGE.NUMBER_BLOCK_DESCRIPTION_2: Save 85% on daily operational processes through automation.
LANDING_PAGE.NUMBER_BLOCK_DESCRIPTION_3: Produce financial and AI Auditing reports every 24 hours.
LANDING_PAGE.HERO_CONTENT_1: Trained on more than 800 million financial data.
LANDING_PAGE.HERO_CONTENT_3: Consensus through zero-knowledge proof and algorithms.
LANDING_PAGE.CAROUSEL_CONTENT_1: Through a bio-inspired routing model and role-based mechanism, we develop a highly efficient peer-to-peer network architecture. This system enables fast communication and protocol execution, supporting a blockchain system operating near traditional database efficiency. This ensures seamless handling of vast access requests from zero-knowledge bookkeeping (zk-bookkeeping) while minimizing data tampering risks.
LANDING_PAGE.CAROUSEL_CONTENT_2: We authenticate user identity using elliptic curve digital signature technology. Users provide proof of identity, validity period, purpose, and supplementary information, generating a time-limited and authorized identity certificate using a designated private key. This independent verification process ensures each zero-knowledge bookkeeping entry is endorsed by professionals or enterprises, deterring errors in bookkeeping.
LANDING_PAGE.CAROUSEL_TITLE_3: ZK- Proof Blockchain Preservation of Evidence
LANDING_PAGE.CAROUSEL_CONTENT_3: Our method transforms data into matrix format, incorporating noise data and performing coordinate axis rotations. This process creates verifiable metadata consistent with the original data but cannot be reversed to obtain the original data.
LANDING_PAGE.CAROUSEL_TITLE_4: Real-Time Generation of Accounting Reports Based on ZK- Proof Blockchain Preservation of Evidence
LANDING_PAGE.CAROUSEL_CONTENT_4: By embedding difference value metadata of accounting reports into the noise injection process, we achieve zero-knowledge bookkeeping. This enables real-time generation of accounting reports, including reporting period, list of included metadata, and environmental parameters like exchange rates, based on zero-knowledge blockchain certification.
LANDING_PAGE.CAROUSEL_TITLE_5: Audit Method Based on ZK- Proof Blockchain Preservation of Evidence
LANDING_PAGE.CAROUSEL_CONTENT_5: Using specific algorithms, audits are swiftly conducted to verify the existence, order, and accuracy of metadata in accounting reports. The zero-knowledge proof method confirms metadata authenticity and consistency with the blockchain. This ensures an efficient audit method based on zero-knowledge blockchain certification.
LANDING_PAGE.WHY_ISUNFA_CONTENT_1: Aligns with various international accounting standards and regulations.
LANDING_PAGE.WHY_ISUNFA_CONTENT_2: Enables auditors to review enterprise data anytime and take immediate action when issues arise.
LANDING_PAGE.WHY_ISUNFA_CONTENT_3: Facilitating faster identification and resolution of potential risks and problems, thereby reducing business risks.
LANDING_PAGE.WHY_ISUNFA_CONTENT_4: Complies with regulations requiring continuous auditing in certain industries and jurisdictions.
LANDING_PAGE.WHY_ISUNFA_CONTENT_5: Demonstrates the enterprise's ongoing commitment to monitoring and supervision of operations to investors, enhancing trust and transparency in the company.
LANDING_PAGE.iSunFA_101_CONTENT: Integrating blockchain and artificial intelligence, iSunFA offers impeccable compliance solutions for forensic accounting and auditing. Real-time asset monitoring, intelligent anomaly detection, and prompt accounting filings secure virtual currency assets. With iSunFA, focus on business development, free from compliance worries.
LANDING_PAGE.WHY_iSunFA_DESCRIPTION_1: Are the virtual currency assets you currently hold secure?
LANDING_PAGE.WHY_iSunFA_DESCRIPTION_2: When your company invests in virtual currency assets, how should you manage and account for them?
LANDING_PAGE.WHY_iSunFA_DESCRIPTION_3: How do fintech startups ensure compliance?
LANDING_PAGE.WHY_iSunFA_DESCRIPTION_4: Is your accountant fast enough to meet the Hong Kong SFC's requirement of shortening accounting cycles to one month?
LANDING_PAGE.TOOL_INTRO_1_DESCRIPTION: Simplify transaction tracking and analysis on the blockchain. Gain valuable insights, verify transactions, and follow the flow of digital assets effortlessly. Experience transparency and real-time auditing with ease.
LANDING_PAGE.TOOL_INTRO_2_DESCRIPTION: Simplify and streamline the auditing process for financial transactions on the blockchain. With our user-friendly tool, you can ensure the accuracy and integrity of financial records while leveraging the transparency and security of blockchain technology. Gain confidence in your financial audits with efficiency.
LANDING_PAGE.TOOL_INTRO_3_DESCRIPTION: Whether you need monthly, quarterly, or annual financial reports, our AI Financial Reports Generator enables you to generate professional and reliable reports with just a few clicks.
LANDING_PAGE.DOWNLOAD_SUBTITLE: Carry the most useful tool with you
